channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7180] BufferedReader is not closed in MetaStoreSchemaInfo ctor
item.description:
Here is related code:

      BufferedReader bfReader =
        new BufferedReader(new FileReader(upgradeListFile));
      String currSchemaVersion;
      while ((currSchemaVersion = bfReader.readLine()) != null) {
        upgradeOrderList.add(currSchemaVersion.trim());

BufferedReader / FileReader should be closed upon return from ctor.
item.summary: BufferedReader is not closed in MetaStoreSchemaInfo ctor

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Here is my patch.. I chanaged BufferedReader position and added BufferedReader close statement in finally statement

Please review my source.. Give me chance to contribute source
